Row.Text: Nepalese Unique Improvement. +3 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production and +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on a featureless [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tile and is constructed by the [icon:UNIT_SHERPA] Sherpa once you have the [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Sagarmatha Civic Mastery.

Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on a featureless [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tile and is constructed by the [icon:UNIT_SHERPA] Sherpa once you have the [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Sagarmatha Civic Mastery.[n]Nepalese Unique Improvement.
+6 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. +20 [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with all other Leaders. Ageless. Must be built in Grassland or Tropical adjacent to a Mountain.
+20 [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with all other Leaders.[N]Must be built in Grassland or Tropical adjacent to a Mountain.
Those who teach this ocean of wisdom realize the momentary nature of things.
